column4: anyone know how to decrease the boot time in ibex? its slower than hardy for me
your boot time depends on what applications you have on startup. check your /etc/init.conf and see what you have on boot and remove if you don't need it
check this https://help.ubuntu.com/community/AddingProgramToSessionStartup this is a gui application
I removed some unnecessary startup entries, but gnome still takes longer to load
